description:
Anne and her friends receive the Gardners` call and become full-fledged B.A.s.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Kabe o Joudan to Minashi, Ookina Kabe o Shouri no Yohou to Seyo
I Have Learned to Look Upon Each Little Hindrance as a Jest and Each Great One as the Foreshadowing of Victory
小さな壁を冗談とみなし, 大きな壁を勝利の予報とせよ
